titles.title: A resolution electing officers of the House of Representatives.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Elects the following officers of the House of Representatives: (1) Donnald K. Anderson, of California, as Clerk; (2) Jack Russ, of Maryland, as Sergeant at Arms; (3) James T. Molloy, of New York, as Doorkeeper; (4) Robert V. Rota, of Pennsylvania, as Postmaster; and (5) Reverend James David Ford, of Virginia, as Chaplain.
